name: Entertainment Jansou: That's Pon!
overview: That's Pon! is a mahjong game in which the player can play against 3 computer opponents and he can choose the board type. Manufacturer's description: To significantly upgrade the tiles, which incorporates a popular live-action computer games mahjong PS appeared. Mahjong game by hitting four full routines with no cheating, realistic graphics and other real tiles, and feature rich event, with the appearance of their characters full of personality, is full of fun ideas from a mahjong. Features: •First person perspective. •2D graphics •Cartoon graphics •Mahjong theme.
